title: Forces - forces and acceleration in two cases

content.description: Which of the following correctly relates the accelerations <math alttext="lowercase a sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> to <math alttext="lowercase a sub 2" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>a</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </math> and the tensions <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> to <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>?
content.question: Acceleration Tension A <math alttext="lowercase a sub 1 equals lowercase a sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="T sub 1 is greater than T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> B <math alttext="lowercase a sub 1 equals lowercase a sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="T sub 1 equals T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> C <math alttext="lowercase a sub 1 is greater than lowercase a sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="T sub 1 is greater than T sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> D <math alttext="lowercase a sub 1 is greater than lowercase a sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="T sub 1 equalsT sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
